title: Drupal security advisory (AV26-121)
description: On February 11, 2026, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: QuickEdit  versions prior to 1.0.5 and versions 2.0.0 to versions prior to 2.0.1
UI Icons  versions prior to 1.0.1 and version 1.1.0 to versions prior to 1.1.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
